page.title: 12QUEEN MARY SAILING CLUB
page.content: There is a big reservoir near our school which belongs to {Thames Water} .Once upon a time no one was allowed to use it for sailing but then they gave their permission.Now there is a big {Sailing Club} up on the reservoir.It is like a great big lake 1.25 miles across and 3 miles long.They do all sorts of sailing and board sailing there as well.There are 10 safety boats there,with one on duty at all times. There is an area where sailing is prohibited so that water birds can live there in peace. In rough weather the waves can get so big that they splash right up over the clubhouse.
